info.task: navigate to last tab in tab list
info.title: Navigate to the last tab in a tab list

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstTab
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first tab
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first tab
testPageDocument.querySelector('#nils').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Nils Frahm' tab, navigate to the last tab.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Nils Frahm' tab, navigate to the last tab.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Position of tab in the tab list, 3, is conveyed
Number of tabs in the tab list, 3, is conveyed
